description: Default D&D hero classes with abilities

heroes.name: Barbarian

abilities.name: Raging Strike
abilities.description: A single, ferocious blow fueled by primal fury.

abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
abilities.description: A double strike that deals extra damage to a wounded foe.

abilities.name: Primal Roar
abilities.description: A roar that rattles enemies, dealing minor damage automatically.

abilities.name: Healing Blood
abilities.description: Channel the warrior's inner strength to mend wounds.

heroes.description: A towering, muscular warrior with wild, unkempt hair and fierce amber eyes, clad in tattered leather armor and wielding a massive greataxe dripping with primal energy.

heroes.name: Ranger

abilities.name: Hunter's Mark
abilities.description: Mark your prey and deal extra damage with your attacks.

abilities.name: Cure Wounds
abilities.description: A creature you touch regains hit points through natural magic.

heroes.description: A skilled tracker and archer of the wilderness.

heroes.name: Monk

abilities.name: Flurry of Blows
abilities.description: Make two unarmed strikes in rapid succession.

abilities.name: Stunning Strike
abilities.description: Strike with focused ki to stun your opponent.

abilities.name: Ki Restoration
abilities.description: Channel your ki energy to restore your body and recover hit points.

heroes.description: A master of martial arts and ki energy.

heroes.name: Sorcerer

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.description: Hurl a bolt of chaotic energy at your target.

abilities.name: Fire Bolt
abilities.description: Hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object.

abilities.name: Vampiric Touch
abilities.description: Channel life force to heal yourself through magical means.

heroes.description: A spellcaster with innate magical power.

heroes.name: Druid

abilities.name: Thorn Whip
abilities.description: Create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns.

abilities.name: Cure Wounds
abilities.description: A creature you touch regains hit points through natural magic.

abilities.name: Goodberry
abilities.description: Create berries that restore hit points when consumed.

heroes.description: A guardian of nature who wields primal magic.

heroes.name: Artificer

abilities.name: Arcane Weapon
abilities.description: Infuse a weapon with magical energy to deal extra damage.

abilities.name: Cure Wounds
abilities.description: A creature you touch regains hit points through magical tinkering.

heroes.description: A master of magical invention and technology.

heroes.name: Cleric

abilities.name: Guided Strike
abilities.description: Channel divine power to guide your weapon to its target.

abilities.name: Cure Wounds
abilities.description: A creature you touch regains hit points through divine magic.

abilities.name: Healing Word
abilities.description: A creature of your choice regains hit points with a word.

heroes.description: A holy warrior who channels divine power.

heroes.name: Fighter

abilities.name: Action Surge
abilities.description: Take an additional action to make two powerful attacks.

abilities.name: Second Wind
abilities.description: Regain hit points through sheer determination.

heroes.description: A master of weapons and armor, the Fighter excels in combat.

heroes.name: Wizard

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Three unerring bolts of magical force strike the target.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger and explodes.

abilities.name: Arcane Recovery
abilities.description: Channel arcane energy to restore your vitality and recover hit points.

heroes.description: A wielder of arcane magic, the Wizard commands powerful spells.

heroes.name: Bard

abilities.name: Vicious Mockery
abilities.description: Insult a creature with magical words that deal psychic damage.

abilities.name: Healing Word
abilities.description: A creature of your choice regains hit points through your inspiring words.

heroes.description: A versatile performer who uses music and magic.

heroes.name: Warlock

abilities.name: Eldritch Blast
abilities.description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Place a curse on a creature that deals extra damage.

abilities.name: Dark Pact Recovery
abilities.description: Draw upon your patron's power to restore your vitality.

heroes.description: A spellcaster who made a pact with otherworldly beings.

heroes.name: Paladin

abilities.name: Divine Smite
abilities.description: Channel divine energy to smite your enemies.

abilities.name: Lay on Hands
abilities.description: Touch a creature to restore its hit points through divine power.

heroes.description: A holy warrior who smites evil with divine power.

heroes.name: Rogue

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Strike with precision when your enemy is distracted.

abilities.name: Cunning Action
abilities.description: Use your quick reflexes to strike and reposition.

abilities.name: Quick Recovery
abilities.description: Use your quick wits and agility to patch up wounds and recover.

heroes.description: A stealthy combatant who strikes from the shadows.
